item.description: They’ll have a delicious taco bar for us to enjoy from 5 to 6:30 pm.  Join us after work in the lounge for a great time and mingle with old and new friends!  It’s a nice way to end the work week.  There is no charge.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to 520 Main Street:  I‑91 to left Exit 22S (Rt. 9S), continue 5.5 miles, turn right onto Washington St. (Rt. 66), at Main Street light turn right, facility on right.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be inside in the lounge.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Happy Hour
